CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper June 21, 1941, pg. 24, reads: "Board of Education Program in Full Swing - Hill District playgrounds of the Board of Education at in full swing and are catering to capacity mobs of youth, as the above pictures show.  The general lack of other facilities makes these recreational centers the only available place for young Hill citizens to play, other than the streets and alleys...  In the upper right photo, taken at the Minersville school, one supervisor is seen with a group of over fifty youth. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Girls and boys encircling another group of children, with man in background on left, on Minersville School playground, Hill District
